Name: Ariel Martin
description:
Ariel wakes up very early to begin his work. He enjoys agriculture and spends most of his time cultivating cassava and beans so that he can support his loved ones.

Ariel has previous experience working with the Kiva loans from MiCrédito, which has left him satisfied. He has chosen to request another Kiva loan from MiCrédito to buy cassava cuttings, seeds, fertilizers, insecticides, foliar nutrients, and compost. In the near future, he wants to acquire new land.
